<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blending Brooch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2097)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 92 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 275 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You roll initiative using [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) and can see a creature

**Requirement** You are a master in Stealth.
</row>

</column>

---

This small, matte-black pin always seems to be on the periphery of your vision, even when you stare directly at it. When you Activate the talisman, choose one creature you can see. You become [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) to that creature unless it succeeds at a DC 28 Will save. This effect lasts for 1 minute or until the target hits you with an attack, whichever comes first.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Blending Brooch
requirement: You are a master in Stealth.
